headline: Unigold Announces the Appointment of Ms. Juana Barcelo and Mr. Andrés Marranzini to the Board of Directors
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - February 17, 2026) - Unigold Inc. (TSXV: UGD) (OTC Pink: UGDIF) (FSE: UGB1) ("Unigold" or the "Company") announces that Ms. Juana Barcelo and Mr. Andrés Marranzini have joined the Board of Directors of the Company.Ms. Barcelo is an experienced business and legal executive with over 15 years of leadership in mining and corporate affairs across Latin America and the Caribbean. Most recently Ms. Barcelo was the President/Country Manager of Barrick Pueblo Viejo,..

content.title: Unigold Announces the Appointment of Ms. Juana Barcelo and Mr. Andrés Marranzini to the Board of Directors

Most recently Ms. Barcelo was the President/Country Manager of Barrick Pueblo Viejo,..

headline: Daura Gold Commences Drilling at Cerro Bayo Gold-Silver Project, Argentina
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - February 17, 2026) - Daura Gold Corp. (TSXV: DGC) (OTC Pink: DGCOF) (the "Company" or "Daura") is pleased to announce that it has commenced its Phase One diamond drilling program at the Cerro Bayo Gold-Silver Project ("Cerro Bayo" or the "Project"), located in Santa Cruz Province, Argentina. Cerro Bayo is located in Argentina's premier gold-silver district, the Deseado Massif, which has produced 600+ million ounces of silver and 20+ million ounces..

content.title: Daura Gold Commences Drilling at Cerro Bayo Gold-Silver Project, Argentina
content.summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - February 17, 2026) - Daura Gold Corp. (TSXV: DGC) (OTC Pink: DGCOF) (the "Company" or "Daura") is pleased to announce that it has commenced its Phase One diamond drilling program at the Cerro Bayo Gold-Silver Project ("Cerro Bayo" or the "Project"), located in Santa Cruz Province, Argentina. Cerro Bayo is located in Argentina's premier gold-silver district, the Deseado Massif, which has produced 600+ million ounces of silver and 20+ million ounces..

headline: Gold and Silver Prices Fall as U.S.-Iran Talks Begin. Trump Says Tehran Wants a Deal.
summary: Gold and silver prices fell early Tuesday as diplomatic negotiations between the U.S. and Iran began in Geneva and as Chinese markets were closed for the Lunar New Year.  Continuous gold futures  were down 2.1% to $4,939 per ounce early Tuesday, while  silver futures  tumbled 5% to $74.10.  Precious metals miners were also lower, with  Freeport-McMoRan  and  Newmont  down by 1.7% and 3.1%, respectively, in premarket trading.

content.title: Gold and Silver Prices Fall as U.S.-Iran Talks Begin. Trump Says Tehran Wants a Deal.
